languages.text: "Они жгли города и загоняли людей в кандалы быстрее, чем наши корабли успевали прийти на помощь. В итоге местный губернатор сбежал, бросив остатки людей на растерзание нелюдям. Ну а те бежали из больших городов, которые манили ксеносов. В итоге леса, что всю жизнь пугали местных плебсов, стали их спасением. Так планета и пришла в упадок — некем было заселять города и некому было добывать ресурсы. Кетца Темер ждал из Империума три новых ковчега, заполненных поселенцами. Да только за пять сотен лет ни один из них так и не попал в Простор".

traits.locale_text: "Они жгли города и загоняли людей в кандалы быстрее, чем наши корабли успевали прийти на помощь. В итоге местный губернатор сбежал, бросив остатки людей на растерзание нелюдям. Ну а те бежали из больших городов, которые манили ксеносов. В итоге леса, что всю жизнь пугали местных плебсов, стали их спасением. Так планета и пришла в упадок — некем было заселять города и некому было добывать ресурсы. Кетца Темер ждал из Империума три новых ковчега, заполненных поселенцами. Да только за пять сотен лет ни один из них так и не попал в Пространство".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Они жгли города и загоняли людей в кандалы быстрее, чем наши корабли успевали прийти на помощь. В итоге местный губернатор сбежал, бросив остатки людей на растерзание нелюдям. Ну а те бежали из больших городов, которые манили ксеносов. В итоге леса, что всю жизнь пугали местных плебсов, стали их спасением. Так планета и пришла в упадок — некем было заселять города и некому было добывать ресурсы. Кетца Темер ждал из Империума три новых ковчега, заполненных поселенцами. Да только за пять сотен лет ни один из них так и не попал в Простор".

traits.locale_text: "They burned down cities and enslaved our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the abhumans's mercy. And those, in turn, ran away from the big cities that attracted the xenos so. So the forests that the plebs were afraid of ended up as their salvation. This was the start of the fall of this planet —nobody was there to populate the cities and produce resources. Quetza Temer had been waiting for three new arks filled with settlers. But in the five hundred years, none of them had ever ended up in the Expanse."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "They burned down cities and enslaved our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the abhumans's mercy. And those, in turn, ran away from the big cities that attracted the xenos so. So the forests that the plebs were afraid of ended up as their salvation. This was the start of the fall of this planet —nobody was there to populate the cities and produce resources. Quetza Temer had been waiting for three new arks filled with settlers. But in the five hundred years, none of them had ever ended up in the Expanse."

The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. traits.locale_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Quemaron las ciudades y esclavizaron a nuestra gente más deprisa de nuestras naves podían intervenir. Al final el gobernador local escapó, dejando a su pueblo a merced de esas bestias. La gente, a su vez, huyó de las grandes ciudades que atraían la atención de los xenos. Y así fue que los bosques que tanto temía la plebe acabaron convirtiéndose en su salvación. Por eso el planeta cayó en franca decadencia; no quedó nadie para habitar las ciudades, ni había quien se dedicase a extraer los recursos naturales. Quetza Temer esperaba la llegada de tres arcas repletas de colonos del Imperium, pero en quinientos años no ha llegado una sola de ellas a la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Quemaron ciudades enteras y esclavizaron a nuestra gente más deprisa de lo que podíamos evacuar con nuestras naves. Al final el gobernador local escapó, dejando a su pueblo a merced de esos seres inhumanos. Y estos, a su vez, huyeron de las grandes ciudades que atraían la atención de los xenos. Así que los bosques que tanto temía la plebe acabaron convirtiéndose en su salvación. Por eso el planeta cayó en franca decadencia; no quedó nadie para habitar las ciudades, ni había quien se dedicase a extraer los recursos naturales. Quetza Temer esperaba la llegada de tres arcas repletas de colonos, pero en quinientos años no ha aparecido una sola de ellas en la Extensión».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “在我们的船赶来救援之前，那些异形就烧毁了我们的城市，奴役了我们的人民。到最后，当地总督逃跑了，剩下的人只能听天由命。大城市吸引了那群畜生的注意，而躲到荒野里的人却幸免于难，人们所惧怕的森林，最终成了他们的救星。就这样，整颗行星陷入了衰败，没人再居住在城市里，也没人再开采资源。之前，帝国派来了三艘载满了移民者的方舟，准备复兴格扎尔特默，但在过去的五百年里，没有一艘方舟顺利抵达科罗努斯扩区。”
languages.original_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “在我们的船赶来救援之前，那些异形就烧毁了我们的城市，奴役了我们的人民。到最后，当地总督逃跑了，剩下的人只能听天由命。大城市吸引了异形的注意，而那些躲到荒野里的人却幸免于难，人们所惧怕的森林，最终成了他们的救星。从那之后，整颗行星陷入了衰败，没人再居住在城市里，也没人再开采资源。之前，帝国派来了三艘载满了移民者的方舟，准备复兴格扎尔特默，但在过去的五百年里，没有一艘方舟顺利抵达科罗努斯扩区。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Ils ont brûlé les villes et réduit les habitants en esclavage plus vite que nos vaisseaux ne pouvaient les aider. À la fin, le gouverneur local a pris la fuite en laissant ceux qui restaient à la merci de ces bêtes sauvages. À leur tour, les survivants ont fui les grandes villes qui attiraient tant les xénos et les forêts qu'ils craignaient tant ont fini par devenir leur planche de salut. La planète a périclité, puisqu'il n'y avait plus personne pour peupler les villes ou extraire les ressources. Quetza Temer attendait de l'Imperium trois nouvelles arches remplies de colons, mais en cinq siècles, aucune n'est arrivée dans les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont brûlé les villes et réduit les habitants en esclavage plus vite que nos vaisseaux ne pouvaient les aider. À la fin, le gouverneur local a pris la fuite en laissant ceux qui restaient à la merci de ces monstres. À leur tour, les survivants ont fui les grandes villes qui attiraient tant les xénos et les forêts qu'ils craignaient tant ont fini par devenir leur planche de salut. La planète a périclité, puisqu'il n'y avait plus personne pour peupler les villes ou extraire les ressources. Quetza Temer attendait trois nouvelles arches remplies de colons, mais en cinq siècles, aucune n'est arrivée dans les Étendues. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「彼らは街を焼き尽くし、俺たちの船が助けるよりも早く、俺たちの民を奴隷にした。結局、現地の総督は逃げ出し、残された人々は獣どものなすがままになった。そしてその者は、異種族を惹きつける大都市から逃げ出した。だから、大衆が恐れていた森が彼らの救いとなった。都市に住む者もなく、資源を採取する者もいなかった。ケツァ・テメルは帝国から入植者を乗せた新しい箱舟を3隻到着すると予想していた。しかし、この500年間、誰ひとりとしてエクスパンスにたどり着くことはなかった」。
languages.original_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは街を焼き尽くし、俺たちの船が助けるよりも早く、俺たちの民を奴隷にした。結局、現地の総督は逃げ出し、残された人々は亜人どものなすがままになった。そしてその者は、ゼノを惹きつける大都市から逃げ出した。だから、平民が恐れていた森が彼らの救いとなった。都市に住む者もなく、資源を採取する者もいなかった。ケツァ・テメルは入植者を乗せた新しい箱舟を3隻待っていた。しかし、この500年間、誰ひとりとしてエクスパンスに到着することはなかった」。
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Sie haben die Städte niedergebrannt und unsere Untertanen schneller versklavt, als unsere Schiffe hätten helfen können. Letztlich ist der örtliche Gouverneur geflohen und hat die übrigen Untertanen der Gnade der Monster ausgeliefert. Und diese letzten Überlebenden sind aus den großen Städten geflohen, die wie ein Magnet für die Xenos waren. Und so wurden die Wälder, die der Pöbel so gefürchtet hatte, zu seiner Rettung. Der Planet verfiel. Es war niemand da, um die Städte zu bevölkern, und es war niemand da, um Ressourcen abzubauen. Quetza Temer wartete auf drei neue Archen mit Siedlern, die aus dem Imperium ankommen sollten. Doch in fünfhundert Jahren hat keine einzige davon die Ausdehnung erreicht."
languages.original_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben Städte niedergebrannt und unsere Untertanen schneller versklavt, als unsere Schiffe hätten helfen können. Letztlich ist der örtliche Gouverneur geflohen und hat die übrigen Untertanen der Gnade der Abhumanen ausgeliefert. Und diese letzten Überlebenden sind aus den großen Städten geflohen, die wie ein Magnet für die Xenos waren. So wurden die Wälder, die der Pöbel fürchtete, letztlich zu seiner Rettung. Der Planet verfiel also. Es war niemand da, um die Städte zu bevölkern, und es war niemand da, um Ressourcen abzubauen. Quetza Temer wartet auf drei neue Archen mit Siedlern. Doch in fünfhundert Jahren ist keine einzige davon je in der Ausdehnung angekommen."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Şehirleri yakıp yıktılar ve halkımızı zincire vurdular. O kadar hızlı gerçekleşti ki gemilerimiz yardıma koşamadı. En sonunda yöre valisi kaçarak kalan halkı o yaratıkların merhametine bıraktı. Halk ise zenoların ilgisini çeken o büyük şehirleri terk etti. İşte ayaktakımının korktuğu o ormanlar, onları böyle kurtardı. Gezegen harabeye döndü. Şehirlerde nüfusu artıracak kimse kalmadığı gibi kaynakları çıkaracak kimse de yoktu. Quetza Temer, İmparatorluk'tan üç ark dolusu yerleşimcinin gelmesini bekledi ancak beş asır içinde hiçbiri Enginlik'e ulaşamadı."
languages.original_text: "They burned down the cities and shackled our people faster than our ships could help. In the end, the local governor ran away, leaving the remaining people at the beasts' mercy. And the people, in turn, fled the big cities that attracted the xenos. And that is how the forests that the rabble feared became their salvation. The planet fell into decay — there was no one to populate the cities, and there was no one to extract resources. Quetza Temer expected three new arks filled with settlers to arrive from the Imperium. But in five hundred years, not one of them has reached the Expanse."
